NAME

SYNOPSIS

DESCRIPTION

The function forces a write of all buffered data for the given output or update via the stream’s underlying write function. The open status of the stream is unaffected. If the argument is flushes open output streams. The function erases any input or output buffered in the given For output streams this discards any unwritten output. For input streams this discards any input read from the underlying object but not yet obtained via this includes any text pushed back via

RETURN VALUES

Upon successful completion 0 is returned. Otherwise, is returned and the global variable is set to indicate the error.

ERRORS

is not an open stream, or, in the case of not a stream open for writing. The function may also fail and set for any of the errors specified for the routine
